duck: Steady flow, a condition of flow that does not change with time
steady definition: direct or sure in movement.

wiki.text:
'Steady' may refer to: *Steady state, a concept used in math and sciences where
variables are time-constant *Steady flow, a condition of flow that does not
change with time
* ''Steady'' (album), a 2006 album by Jim Bianco
wiki.title: steady
